extensionDescription.message: Adds an option to the context menu of images to perform a reverse image search using www.tineye.com

contextMenuLabel.description: The text that appears in the context menu for images

optionsTitle.description: The title of the TinEyeextension options page

optionsHeader.description: The title of the TinEyeextension options page

sortOrderLabel.description: The label for the sort order radio group

sortOrderLastUsedLabel.description: The label for the radio option indicating the 'last used' sort order

sortOrderBestMatchLabel.description: The label for the radio option indicating the 'best match' sort order

sortOrderMostChangedLabel.description: The label for the radio option indicating the 'most changed' sort order

sortOrderBiggestImageLabel.description: The label for the radio option indicating the 'biggest image' sort order

openSearchesLabel.description: The label for the radio group to select in which tab new searches will open

openSearchesBackgroundLabel.description: The label for the 'open searches in background tab' option

openSearchesForegroundLabel.description: The label for the 'open searches in foreground tab' option

openSearchesCurrentLabel.description: The label for the 'open searches in current tab' option

submitButtonValue.description: The label for the submit button on the options page
